DESCRIPTION: Upon playing a #yFire card, increase your #yFire #yAffinity by the amount of the cost of the card played.
Upon reaching 3 #yFire #yAffinity or more become #yHeated. Your #yFire #yAffinity is reset upon playing an #yIce card or at the start of your turn.
Gain #yStrength the amount of #yFire #yAffinity you have. Your #yFire attacks also apply the same amount of #yAblaze.
Target takes damage equal to their #yAblaze amount whenever they attack.
Upon playing a #yIce card, increase your #yIce #yAffinity by the amount of the cost of the card played.
Upon reaching 3 #yIce #yAffinity or more become #yChilled. Your #yIce #yAffinity is reset upon playing a #yFire card or at the start of your turn.
Gain #yDexterity the amount of #yIce #yAffinity you have. Also, whenever you fully #yBlock an attack, apply the same amount of #yFrozen.
Target takes damage equal to their #yFrozen amount whenever they get attacked.
Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
